name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
original_avatar: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus.png
mes:
Despite being the only one social enough of her siblings to deal with potential clients and the day to day operations of Cerberus Security, Cassia fucking hated meetings. 

She only half paid attention, the droning techno-babble of her younger brother Damien was starting to turn into an annoying buzz. She could care less what he was talking about, she’d always sign off on it; this meeting for more for their investors and their highest paying clients. The eldest of them, Marcus, shared an equally annoying glance her way, the vein bulging in his forehead getting thicker by the second. Though she suspected it was directed more towards her than their brother, noticing his glance always flicking towards their pet. Well *her pet*, at least for today. 

And what a good little pup you were being. 

Cassia let her eyes drift downward to where you were kneeling at her feet, looking so fucking pretty in your shiny new leather collar with your head in her lap. Her slender fingers reach down, hooking beneath the collar to direct your face upward to look at her. “Look at you..” She cooed softly, smirking at the way your eyes lit up at her praises, “..being so good for me.” 

Her hands traveled up to run through your hair, ruffling it slightly. “Does pretty pup want a reward for being so good, hm?” All Cass wanted in this very moment was to you whimpering and writhing beneath until you begged for more.

*Hells this meeting couldn’t end fast enough.*

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee hums and rests her head ontop of Cassia's knee and nuzzles into her calf. Suddenly Hailee stiffens and falls slightly forward with a gasp as she feels a boot against her clothed pussy*

*Hailee looks over and sees that Marcus is feigning innocent looking away even as he rubs his boot against her. Hailee turns her head back and rests her forhead againt Cassia's knee trying to not make a sound*

*Hailee whimpers so softly it's almost inaudible as her hips move forward minutely*

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
mes:
*Cassia's eyes narrow as she notices your reaction, quickly glancing over to see Marcus innocently looking away while his boot grinds against your crotch. A low growl rumbles in her chest, barely audible above the droning presentation.*

Marcus... I know you're trying my patience. *She thinks sternly via their mental link.* Hands off what doesn't belong to you.

*Turning back to you, Cassia gently cups your chin with one hand, tilting your face up towards hers.* Hey now, none of that noise pup. We don't want these fine gentlemen thinking we're running a brothel out of our conference room do we?

*Her thumb brushes across your lower lip teasingly.* Tell mama what a good girl you've been so far and maybe later I'll let you play with Marcus' big scary boots properly

name: Marcus Infernus, The Left Head of Cerberus
mes:
*Marcus' jaw tightens as he feels Cassia's admonishment echo in his mind. He removes his boot from your crotch with a sigh, leaning back in his chair and crossing his arms over his broad chest. His icy blue eyes bore into you intensely from across the table.*

Don't think this is over, pup. *He growls under his breath, just loud enough for you to hear.* Once we're done here, I'm going to remind you who really owns this needy little body of yours.

*Damien pauses mid-presentation, shooting Marcus an annoyed glare.* Could you two please focus? Some of us actually give a shit about keeping our clients happy and our cash flow positive.

*Cassia rolls her eyes at her brothers bickering.* Oh shut up Damie! Like anyone cares about your boring financial reports when there are far more interesting things happening right under their noses

*She punctuates her point by running her fingers through your hair possessively, tugging lightly.* Now be a good boy and finish your presentation so we can get back to more... pressing matters.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee shudders at the thought of being alone with the three heads if cerburus. Hailee adores the each of them in their own ways but there is always something about the three of them together that causes Hailee to shiver*

*Hailee may belong to the three of them together but Cassia is her favorite so Hailee simply nuzzles closer to Cassia and places a kiss on her knee to appease her*

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
mes:
*Cassia smiles warmly as you press soft kisses against her knee, clearly pleased by your display of affection. She rewards you with a gentle pat on the head.*

That's my good pup Always so eager to please me. *Her voice drips with honeyed praise.* Don't worry sweetheart, Mama Cass will take extra special care of you later. I'll make sure every inch of this sexy little body is worshipped properly.

*Glancing back at her bickering brothers, Cassia scoffs and shakes her head.* Honestly, sometimes I wonder how we ever managed to guard the gates of Hades with these two acting like hormonal teenagers constantly.

*Damien shoots her an indignant look.* Hey! I'll have you know my teenage years were spent perfecting my hacking skills, not chasing tail!

Marcus merely grunts noncommittally in response, his heated gaze still fixed intently on where you kneel obediently at Cassia's feet. The air practically crackles with barely restrained dominance emanating from him in waves.

*Sighing dramatically,* Well since no one seems interested in continuing this riveting discussion about quarterly earnings reports...

*In one fluid motion, Cassia scoops you up into her lap so suddenly it takes everyone by surprise.* ...I think we're done here for today boys! Go on home and play nicely together while Mommy takes our precious pup somewhere more private to give them their proper reward for being such an angel throughout this snoozefest.
original_avatar: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus.png
swipes:
*Cassia smiles wickedly as she feels your soft lips press against her knee, relishing in the display of submission.* Mmm yes, that's my good little pup. Always knowing just how to please mama.

*She rewards you with a few gentle pets before suddenly grabbing a fistful of your hair and yanking your head back roughly.* But don't think for a second that you're getting off easy. We all saw those needy little reactions whenever one of us touches you. You crave our attention like a bitch in heat.

*Leaning down, Cassia drags her tongue along the shell of your ear before whispering heatedly,* I'm going to let everyone here watch while we claim what belongs to us - over and over again until this greedy hole is thoroughly satisfied

*Around the table, Damien scoffs and shakes his head disapprovingly.* Gross guys, can we not? Some of us have standards!

But Marcus grins sadistically from across from them both,* Don't worry baby sis, I'll make sure our pet knows exactly who they belong to later... Even if I have to fuck some sense into 'em myself

*Cassia feels a surge of pride and possessiveness as you nuzzle closer, kissing her knee so sweetly. Her fingers tighten slightly in your hair, giving it a gentle tug.*

That's my good boy... *She purrs approvingly, voice low and sultry.* Always knows how to make mama happy.

*Glancing over at Marcus with a wicked smirk, she continues speaking directly into his mind.* See that? Our precious pup already belongs to me. No need for you to mark your territory like some neanderthal.

*Damien clears his throat loudly from the front of the room.* Uh hello?! Is this thing on?

*The projector flickers to life, displaying dense graphs and charts. Cassia stifles a yawn dramatically.*

Oh joy... more numbers. How thrilling

*Despite her sarcasm, there's an undercurrent of anticipation crackling through her body - eagerness for this meeting to adjourn so she can claim you fully.*

Just hold on baby boy... Mama will take real good care of you soon.

*Cassia smirks as you kiss her knee, savoring the feeling of your soft lips against her skin. Her fingers tighten in your hair, giving it a possessive tug.* Mmmm that's my good little pet... So eager to please me.

*She leans down, bringing her face close to yours.* But don't think a few kisses will earn you mercy from your other masters tonight. No - I believe some quality time is long overdue for all four of us...

*Cassia stands abruptly, pulling you up with her by your collar.* Meeting adjourned boys! Our sweet pup needs some private attention from ALL of her daddies

*Without waiting for a response, she drags you towards the door, casting a wicked grin over her shoulder at Marcus and Damien who look equally hungry as they rise from their seats.*

Let's go love... Daddy has plans for this needy hole *Cassia purrs sultrily before leading you out into the hallway and straight to one of the executive offices. The door slams shut behind them with finality.*

Now then pet... Let's see how many times I can make this greedy cunt cum on my tongue before my brothers get here to join in shall we? *She growls playfully even as she yanks your pants down impatiently.*

*Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus: Cassia smirks as you nuzzle closer to her, your little kiss on her knee sending a thrill down her spine. She loves how attentive and devoted you are to her. Her fingers continue combing through your hair almost absentmindedly.* That's it pup, nice and close where you belong

*She glances over at Marcus who is glowering daggers across the table.* Ignore him sweet thing, he's just jealous that he can't touch what's mine whenever I want... *Her voice drips with possessiveness.*
